title: 406Man who attacked Charlie Kirk supporter at Berkeley is a Muslim rapper named ‘Jihad.’posted9 hour
content:
793 Man who attacked Charlie Kirk supporter at Berkeley is a Muslim rapper named ‘Jihad.’ posted 13 hours ago by kinbergfan 59 comments award share report block Andy Ngo @MrAndyNgo • 1d A Muslim far-left extremist who severely beat a TPUSA attendee on the face after robbing him at UC Berkeley has been identified as Jihad Dphrepaulezz. The 25-year-old listed @CAPublicHealth as his employer. Dphrepaulezz is a rapper known as "A.R. The Believer." He tried Andy Ngo @MrAndyNgo • 2d UC Berkeley (Nov. 10) — A far-left extremist stole a conservative man's necklace & then punched him repeatedly in the face when he tried to take it back outside the TPUSA event. The victim was bloodied, and the leftists racially mocked him for being white.

Maybe “Jihad” can help us process our 80 year mortgages. permalink parent award report block reply LearnAboutRoaches 0 points 3 hours ago There is no verifiable evidence that Donald Trump said, "We need him though because we're stupid". This quote is very similar to a long-running, widely debunked internet meme that falsely attributes a statement to Trump from a supposed 1998 People magazine interview: "If I were to run, I'd run as a Republican. They're the dumbest group of voters in the country. They believe anything on Fox News. I could lie and they'd still eat it up. I bet my numbers would be terrific". Fact-checking organizations, including Snopes and FactCheck.org, have confirmed this specific quote is fake and does not appear in any known source. If you heard this quote recently, it is likely a misattribution or a fabricated statement, as no credible news sources have reported him saying this. permalink parent award report block reply ThisTrainHasNoBrakes 1 points 1 hour ago Are you retarded, or just ignorant?
